name: Evade (itwist)
description:
Evade is a new arcade game for android, it is one of the best pixel games with retro graphics. The goal of the game is to survive from falling blocks, make sure you don't get squashed or its game over :(. Using your parkour skills to your advantage is the key to being better, as tons of blocks accumulate the challenge will rise. However, falling blocks isn't the only challenge as you will have to keep away from bombs that explode after a while! There will be tons of characters that you can get. 

CHARACTERISTICS:
+Retro graphics (pixel art)
+Avoid the falling blocks
+Keep away from bombs
+Tons of players
+And lots of fun!
+It's free!

Exciting adventures await!

-ArcadeSoft, a 14 year old dev
